titleStmt.title: Merie tales newly imprinted [and] made by Master Skelton Poet Laureat
titleStmt.author: Skelton, John, 1460?-1529, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetstreat beneath the Conduit at the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist, by Thomas Colwell,

notesStmt.note: Skelton is the hero of this collection of anecdotes, many of them apocryphal.
Running title reads: Merie tales of Skelton.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist
